attributes.action: Scrap any plans for identity cards as the UK parliament cannot be trusted to safeguard our personal information as witnessed by the child benefit lost records.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not trust the UK parliament to safeguard our data when used for the proposed identity cards. This will again be an IT project that will go way over budget. Not deliver what it promises and is against our civil liberties. This is starting to have echos of the Poll tax fiasco.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
